short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Simple New Tab inspired by Google's 'Material You' design.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple new tab page inspired by Google's 'Material You' design. It is built around the Cirrus Suite and uses Seekr to search, as well as offering shortcuts to Cirrus Suite products at the bottom, if enabled. You can also enable the AI tools short cut, offering short cuts to various AI chat and image generation tools. When viewing the page, it displays an analog clock, with the current time and date, a weather center, displaying the humidity, real feel, temperature, and location for your area. Lastly, and most importantly, it features a stylish home bar to search the internet with.
